name: Square Dungeon 2
description:
The 7 warriors and the king ended the millennium war against the demons and drove the demons to the brink of extinction, but the warriors were gradually corrupted. The demon king left a prophecy to the human king before death that the warriors would betray him when the Armageddon came. As a warrior, what will you choose on the Armageddon?


This is a relatively niche text-based adventure game, which incorporates elements of dungeons and Roguelike. The operation mode is similar to Minesweeper where you click on the grid to unlock the surrounding grids, which requires you to be bold, choose reasonable routes and find the hidden levels in the dungeon so as to challenge higher levels.



Currently, there are 7 occupations to choose from. You can choose 1 main occupation, 2 sub-occupations, and build your favorite skill combinations.



New skill library, talent system, buff system and relic system.



Explore the secrets deep in the dungeon on random maps. Each exploration provides a different experience.
